metadata.othernotes:
Some character notes:

- A little dim witted, but not overly stupid – she makes bad decisions due to impulsiveness. For one, she's not very good at poker.
- Has an abrasive, undermining personality. She's mean-spirited in a very juvenile delinquent way, being able to dish out petty jabs but not able to take them well in return.
- She was a juvenile delinquent before joining Team Magma. Now she's an adult delinquent.
- She is in her mid-twenties, and joined Team Magma a few years ago of her own volition. Team Magma gives them a pittance in pay, but does provide (one copy of) their uniforms.
- She shares a group chat with the other Team Magma grunts. She has a smartphone for this purpose.
- While she sees herself as an individual, in a way she represents all Team Magma Grunts, from Ruby, Sapphire, Emerald, Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire. Her personality is an overall mix of the various NPCs of her trainer class.
- She has been in battles against both protagonist characters (May and Brendan) from the Hoenn games, although it is intentionally left vague as to what order or circumstance they encountered each other in.
- Her favourite Pokémon species is Numel, and she has a pet Numel (and various Numel-themed merchandise items).
- She can swim, but doesn't like going into deep water, mainly because she's afraid of getting attacked by wild Pokémon.
- Incidentally, her least favourite Pokémon is Sharpedo, due to a childhood incident.
- Sexuality speaking, she is openly bisexual, and will shamelessly lust after both male and female characters - in the sense that she'll say what's on her mind about what she sees. However, she's apprehensive about other players trying to 'hook up' after the game, as she's intimidated by people who are too forward.
- She will talk at length about Team Magma's goals if given the chance, but only has a very basic/flat view of their overall goals: Capture a legendary pokemon, use it to create more land, humans use that land, and everybody profits except the water pokemon that were displaced.
- Has an intense rivalry with the Team Aqua Grunt (Team Aqua being a rival team from the same game). This can go between really dumb banter to unintentionally complimenting each other... and possibly more.

case.name: Team Magma Grunt appeared!
case.description: A generic NPC has shown up to play! Other characters might want to assign her a nickname (like "Red" or "Hoodie"), because she doesn't have a real name otherwise - she gets cut off by the game starting before she can say it.

case.name: Showing her butt
case.description: After becoming naked, she will occasionally around and show her butt while panicking. All instances of her showing her butt have the "magma_showing_butt" marker.

case.name: Hood Down
case.description: Her face is no longer covered by a big shadow from her hoodie. She's also very protective of her hoodie, noting that she'd have to pay for a replacement if she lost it.

case.name: Checking the Group Chat
case.description: When she's saying the marker af_idle_group_chat, she's checking the Team Magma Grunt group chat on her phone. The marker is set to a specific number for each line.

case.name: Magma Spiel
case.description: In her Stage 1 Must Strip/Stage 1 Stripping/Stage 2 Stripped dialogue she talks about why the ocean is bad and team magma is great. It has two branches. Take a look at her dialogues for all three parts and write responses based on the markers she uses!

case.name: Magma Spiel - Water Pokemon are scary
case.description: One branch of her Magma Spiel dialogues. This one focuses on scary water pokemon creatures

case.name: Magma Spiel - Water causes natural disasters
case.description: One branch of her Magma Spiel dialogues. This one emphasises water-caused natural disasters

notes.note: If the player isn't gay, magma grunt slowly starts flirting with them when they strip
If the player isn't gay, magma grunt slowly starts flirting with them when they strip
replace later
Disabled until I can rework this into a different line. I like the idea of this line but not its implementation, it's a bit clunky. Could be better as a reveal reaction, maybe?
This is a fallback in case, for some reason, the finish_dramatic or finish_silent cases don't work. It defaults to a silent one anyway.
If she doesnt say the marker for Loud or Silent by this point, she ends up defaulting to a silent one anyway.
If this line fires, she recognises May when May has to strip from stage 0. If that line fires first, this one doesn't play.

So assuming everything "works as intended", she should always go to a more specific case (such as the land, water, or sucrose branches) but this case is here as a fallback, this line works on its own and will keep the game flowing

Just a heads up: for the sake of letting her dialogue flow correctly, Magma Grunt won't respond to dialogue at this stage unless she can work it into her next two lines as well. More experimentation is required but for right now I'm going to try responding to the sucrose lines. - Nord, 13th of July

Just a heads up: for the sake of letting her dialogue flow correctly, Magma Grunt won't respond to dialogue at this stage unless she can work it into her next two lines as well. More experimentation is required but for right now I'm going to try responding to the sucrose lines. - Nord, 13th of July
The selfie collectable should unlock at this stage when the Finished Game case runs, so this might be redundant

This was set to 1-4 finished masturbating, presumably because she's comparing herself to other people. But, I want this to fire in as many games as possible, and Magma Grunt tends to lose first because of her bad AI... for now, I'll make this play after just 3 rounds in stage, and take a look at possible solutions later.
I don't think there are any guys who use this tag at the moment but hey, it's future proofing
GAEC = gender agnostic early comments
Reset's her persistent markers against the player, allowing for a clean slate.
On games 3 and above (i.e Is Warmed Up to Human) she'll make these idle comments directed at the human if they're both finished
On games 3 and above (i.e Is Warmed Up to Human) she'll make these idle comments directed at the human if they're both finished
Has to be priority 999 because her shark costume stops being used at this stage, so she can't use an 'after' pose for it.
note that magma grunt has like five different ways of mis-saying nagamimi's name in her nicknames tab lol
Has to be priority 999 because her shark costume stops being used at this stage, so she can't use an 'after' pose for it.
This will set her nickname to be a few "Perverted X" type nicknames.
If Kazuma is present, she says the same thing he would.
If Kazuma is present, she says the same thing he would.

label.label: The human won the last game
One Finger Selfie (MG Defeat, Human Loss)
When you die do you become a ghost-type
No opponents finished; No opponents currently masturbating
Opponents have not finished, and are mast
All Opp Still Covered by Major
Why are we here? (after 3 player losses)
2nd game w hoodie in a row
3rd game w hoodie in a row

markers.marker: Magma Grunt said something particularly prideful when she was in stage 8, and might be setting herself up for failure.
Magma Grunt had a good hand and was very boastful, but still lost.
Idle dialogue in her After Finished stage where she checks the Magma Grunt group chat.
Idle dialogue in her After Finished stage where she checks the Magma Grunt group chat.
Idle dialogue in her After Finished stage where she checks the Magma Grunt group chat.
Idle dialogue in her After Finished stage where she checks the Magma Grunt group chat.
Idle dialogue in her After Finished stage where she checks the Magma Grunt group chat.
Idle dialogue in her After Finished stage where she checks the Magma Grunt group chat.
Idle dialogue in her After Finished stage where she checks the Magma Grunt group chat.
She does a Electabuzzfeed quiz and finds out that she is a charmander at heart.
Shown her butt (butt_pre_roundreveal) but didn't lose the round
Shown her butt (butt_didntlose_after), didn't lose the round, turns forward again
Shown her butt (butt_pre_roundreveal), lost the round
Shown her butt (butt_lostround) and starts masturbation, turning forward again
Hand=Any, turns around to show her butt.
Asking the other players if they do this often
Magma Grunt is the first one to be naked... and nobody else has stripped ANYTHING at all.
The player has completed the epilogue at least once, either from in-game or from the gallery.
Has mentioned WcDonalds, a fast food chain, in the context of Erufuda
Magma Grunt deliberately plays up her orgasm and announces it loudly
Follow up from finish_dramatic, she explains that she's not usually a screamer but decided to play it up this time.
Magma Grunt has a very subdued orgasm
Follow up from finish_silent, she explains that she's not really a screamer and had a subdued orgasm.
She has had internal thoughts about finishing and has decided to be loud when she orgasms
General tracking of if she has had her thoughts about whether she should orgasm loudly or quietly.
She has had internal thoughts about finishing and has decided to be quiet when she orgasms
Idle dialogue where she looks at her phone. The topic is Sharpedo (Shark) attacks.
Idle dialogue where she looks at her phone. The topic is Wailords (whales) and boats
Idle dialogue where she looks at her phone. Wailord topic part 2.
Idle dialogue that references the fan idea of 'delta pokemon' - pokemon with different types, before the existence of regional variants (e.g. alolan)
Idle dialogue about the idea that when you die, you become a ghost type pokemon
Idle dialogue about accidentally eating pet food (pokeblocks)
An incremental marker
Uses Index counting logic (e.g. game 1 = marker 0) Counts how many times the player has finished a full game against the Magma Grunt (to the very end incl. last lines of dialogue)
Stores who won the last game, this is either SELF if she won, or it's the id of the player who won, e.g. human.
She's the first one to be naked while all opponents are still covered by major articles
Has mentioned the fast food place owned by team magma
Has said dialogue that unlocks the epilogue.
MG makes the most blatant, overused "bad cards" joke in the game, and even she doesn't like that she did it.
Magma Grunt is showing her butt when saying this marker.
Magma Grunt starts masturbating. She name drops the Magma Admin, Courtney
Magma Grunt starts masturbating. She mentions the Magma Admins in general
Magma Grunt starts masturbating. She mentions other Magma Grunts in general terms
Has seen another Team Magma Grunt at game start
Has seen an Undead player at game start
When Nagisa says "please be nice to me" the MG genuinely takes it to heart and eases up on her.
When the game was starting she was interrupted before she could say her name.
Says a line towards a wealthy opponent. Once per target so that she doesnt say these lines all game.
Player's preferences allow her to be flirty towards the player.
This tracks a game in progress. If 1, the game is in progress/was in progress. If 0, a game hasn't started yet. If it's set to 1 at game start, that means the player abandoned the last game.
Player is not attracted to me, so cuts out flirty dialogue.
Mentions the game of Pokemon Monopoly, Pokémonopoly
Plays a single line per target that has the Aggressive tag
Plays a single line per target that has the Fancy tag
Plays a single line per target that has the Mean tag
Spotted Cynthia. Out of fear, MG's AI drops to 'throw' until she ends up stripping a layer.
After spotting Cynthia, dialogue with this marker resets MG's AI back to her normal level.
Magma Grunt recognises May and is a bit afraid of her.
Magma Grunt has spotted May at the start of the game, doesn't recognise her yet.
Said a motto in the name of Team Magma
Magma Grunt is reacting to the first ZLS character to be outed as a zombie.
Magma Grunt is still in shock from a ZLS zombie reveal, and only says "..." during her next hand.

pendingLines.line: Don't laugh, but... before joining Team Magma, I was an Aroma Lady.
One of my sisters wanted to be a Black Belt - she settled for Karate Girl in the end.
Who shows up to strip poker wearing a swimsuit? Are you a member of Team Aqua trying to be incognito?!
